NewsGrid

My ongoing project as a John S. Knight fellow at Stanford University.

projects/newsgrid.html
JSK fellowship challenges

CartoDB

I was a member of the team launching and developing this open source mapping and data platform. CartoDB was a finalist at the 2012 Online News Association Journalism Awards as a Technical Innovation in the Service of Digital Journalism.

cartodb.com/

20 years of aid money

This ongoing project exposes and analyzes all money distributed to aid organizations by the Spanish government in the last two decades, when Spain became the sixth largest donor in the world.

projects/aid.html
porcausa.org/ayuda-desarrollo/ (Spanish)

Neighborhood Index

What is the most representative neighborhood of a given city? A pilot project led by the Social Epidemiology Group from Universidad de Alcala built an index to answer this question and enable the comparison of cities from different countries.

Map: Finding the median neighborhood
Media coverage (Spanish)

The Great Tohoku Earthquake

An earthquake of magnitude of 9.0 occurred March 11, 2011, off the Pacific coast of Japan. This project explores how the earthquake was felt across the country.

projects/tohoku.html
